title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same feature parity as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider in LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); clone of ChatGPT interface but 100% local.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & async APIs, streaming, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API; supports chat, completion, and model management.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models; includes history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like code-completion plugin powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function calling, RAG, fine-tuning, and edge deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and autoscaling support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: One-command Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Weaviate, and Nginx for full local LLM lab.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + Chroma to chat with your documents.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Python Discord.py bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama; reproducible builds and declarative GPU (CUDA/Rocm) support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Bolt.js Slack bot that threads intelligent replies from Ollama models with optional RAG.

title: ollama-keras
summary: KerasNLP experimental wrapper to run Ollama models inside Keras workflows for fine-tuning.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.
